work.name: Laboratory of Theoretical Biochemistry, CNRS
highlights: Lead author of an advanced review on interactive molecular simulations (IMS) \cite{lanrezac2022}
Development of a software suite integrating visualisation and molecular simulation with human interaction \cite{lanrezac2022a,lanrezac2023a}
Exploratory research on MDverse web app for large-scale molecular simulation data analysis.

work.name: Institute of Mineralogy, Physics of Materials and Cosmochemistry, CNRS
highlights: Developed a cyclic peptide docking method by combining Autodock with REMD simulations in GROMACS, and compared the results with the HADDOCK docking tool.
Manual design of cyclic peptides with UCSF-Chimera.

work.name: Institute of Systematics, Evolution and Biodiversity, CNRS
highlights: Contributed to developing a program for rapid protein structure similarity searches. (Python, C).

courses: Interpretation of experimental data through interactive simulation and molecular visualization

projects.name: BioSpring
projects.description: Interactive simulation engine based on an extended elastic network model.

projects.name: UnityMol
projects.description: Molecular viewer using Unity game engine.

projects.name: MDDriver
projects.description: Socket for data communication of molecular simulation software.

projects.name: UNILIPID
projects.description: UNiversal Implicit LIPId-protein Description. It is versatile implicit lipid-protein framework for modeling membrane interactions across multiple scales, offering support for complex membrane geometries, and advanced user features like real-time analysis.

projects.name: NutoMetrics
projects.description: Side project application that performs detailed nutritional analysis by inventorying food products and analyzing their nutrients. The app provides users with a scientific overview of their dietary intake and allows for experimental combinations of foods to optimize nutritional value.
